title: How to Make Raindrop Cake

steps.headline: Put sugar and agar agar in a saucepan.
Add water little by little and stir well until the agar is dissolved completely.
Bring the water to a rapid boil.
Grease the mold so the cake can come out easily.
Put the water in a round/ sphere mold.
Add some flavor to it.
steps.description: Here Tutti Frutti (colorful chopped candied fruits), some mango pieces and basil leaves have been added to make the cake colorful.

steps.headline: Keep in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
Take out and remove from the mold.
Plate it up.
steps.description: The big raindrop cake is ready.

steps.headline: Serve with kinako and black sugar syrup.

text: Put sugar and agar agar in a saucepan. Mix it. Add water little by little and stir well until the agar is dissolved completely.  Bring the water to a rapid boil.  Once done, cool down.  Grease the mold so the cake can come out easily.  Put the water in a round/ sphere mold.  Add some flavor to it. Here Tutti Frutti (colorful chopped candied fruits), some mango pieces and basil leaves have been added to make the cake colorful. Keep in the refrigerator for 1 hour.  Take out and remove from the mold.  Plate it up. The big raindrop cake is ready. Serve with kinako and black sugar syrup.
